import React, { useState } from "react"; import classNames from 'classnames'; import styles from './style.module.scss'; import type { UserRequest, Av } from 'services/auth' type ModalProps = { onClose: () => void } export const UpdateModal: React.FC = ({ onClose}) => { const cs = classNames(styles.cButton, styles.uploadPhoto) const [ profile, setProfile ] = useState({ first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', csrfmiddlewaretoken: '' }) return (

Please complete your profile.

Upload Photo
Import from Facebook

  • Name:

  • Location:

); };
